duties_responsibilities.duty: Travel to multiple stores to provide excellent customer service and achieve sales efficiency.
Increase existing customer share and build relationships with new customers.
Analyze territory sales performance reports and develop strategic plans to increase growth.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate with at least one year of sales or retail experience.
Ability to work a 50-hour work week Monday-Friday and lift up to 65 pounds on a periodic basis.
Up to 30% travel in territory and some outside travel required throughout the year.
